defs: a kind of swollen cake made of rice etc.
one who speaks without regard to the esteem of the other person or crossing the moral limits.
a disease.
the act of joining or fastening with stitches with a needle and thread; a sewing.
a making of (a fabric) on a loom by interlacing threads or yarns; weaving.
a strong longing for; a desire.
(phil.) that which binds the soul with the worldly affairs (as opp. with the spiritual values).
a protecting or being protected; an instance of this; protection.
the possession, use or benefit of something; enjoyment.
a game; sport.
the charges paid to a tailor for sewing.
a heavy blow.
(dial.) a projecting support of stone or brick etc. built against a wall; a buttress.
the letter 'ಊ'.
= ಊದಾ.
the tree Styrax benzoin of Styracaceae family; benzoin tree.
= ಊದುಕಡ್ಡಿ.
= ಊದುಕಡ್ಡಿ.
the vaporous matter arising from something burning and made visible by minute particles of carbon suspended in it; smoke.
a swelling esp. an abnormally swollen part of the body: 3) any undesired, uncultivated plant, esp. one growing in profusion so as to crowd out a desired crop, disfigure a lawn, etc.; a weed.
the grass Echinochloa colonum of Poaceae family; a kind of wild millet.
ಊದರಹಾಕು ūdarahāku to cause smoke to rise (by burning something).
= ಊದರ.
ಊದರೆಯಿಡು ūdareyiḍu = ಊದರಹಾಕು.
the state of (a part of the body) being swollen.
= ಊದಿಕೆ.
a colour that is the mixture of sky-blue, black or white hues in different proportion.
the brownish grey colour.
the colour of the clear-sky; sky-blue.
= ಊದಾ.
the grass Echinochloa colonum of Poaceae family; a kind of wild millet.
the tree Lannea coromandelica ( = Odina woodier) of Anacardiaceae family; Indian ash tree.
the tree Styrax benzoin, yielding balsamic resin that is used in medicine and perfumery and as incense; benzoin tree.
the tree Radermachera xylocarpa ( = Stereospermum xylocarpum) of Bignoniaceae family.
to cause the air to move.
to refine a metal (by melting it on fire, and blowing air on the fire).
to cause to blow wind-instruments.
to cause to swell; to cause to increase in size, volume; to cause to bulge or protrude; to inflate.
(the wind or a current of air) to move with some force; to blow.
to blow air from the mouth.
to blow a wind-instrument to produce a sound or series of sounds.
to utter a slander about.

ಊದುವುದನ್ನು ಬಿಟ್ಟು ಒದರುವುದನ್ನು ತಂದ ūduvudannu biṭṭu odaruvudannu tanda (prov.) to get rid of a minor nuisance, bring a bigger one; ಊದುವ ಶಂಖ ಊದಿಬಿಡು, ಆದಹಾಗೆ ಆಗಲಿ ಮಾದಪ್ಪನ ಜಾತ್ರೆ ūduva śaŋkavannu ūdibiḍu ādhāge āgali mādappana jātre (prov.) the dog barks more out of custom than care of the house; 2. do what though ought, let come what may.
to increase in volume or become larger as a result of pressure from within; to dilate; to swell.
to become larger at a particular point (as of the body).
ಊದಿಕೊಂಡಿರು ūdi koṇḍiru to have suppressed anger, which is being shown by the countenance; ಊದಿಕೊಳ್ ūdikoḷ = ಊದು2; 3) to be angry from being dissatisfied.
a gum resin obtained from various Arabian and African trees (genus Boswellia) of the bursera family and used in perfumes and as incense; olibanum; frankincense.
ಊದಿನಕಡ್ಡಿ ūdina kaḍḍi = ಊದುಕಡ್ಡಿ.
the act of a person who slanders.
a thin stick burned to get fragrant fumes, esp. in religious rites; an incense stick.
= ಊದುಕಾಮಾಲೆ.
a disease characterised by the eyeballs, the skin and the urine becoming abnormally yellowish as a result of increased amounts of bile pigments in blood, and body swelling.
a tower-like smelting furnace for separating metal, esp. iron, from the impurities in the ore, in to which a blast of air is forced from below to produce the intense heat needed; a blast furnace.
a tube for forcing air or gas into a flame to intensify and concentrate its heat; a blow-pipe.
a man who utters a false statement to another damaging to a third person's character, reputation, etc.; a slanderer.
the nostril of a whale, on the top of its head; a blowpipe.
= ಊದುಕಡ್ಡಿ.
a swollen or bulged chin.
an acute communicable disease, usually of childhood, caused by a virus and characterised by swelling of the salivary glands, esp. the parotid; mumps.
= ಊದುಕಾಮಾಲೆ.
= ಊದುಕಾಮಾಲೆ.
= ಊದುಕಾಮಾಲೆ.
a swollen leg or foot.
fire intensified by blowing air on it.
= ಊದುಕೊಳವೆ.
= ಊದುಕೊಳವೆ.
a long, tube-like weapon through which darts or pellets are blown; a blow-gun.
= ಊದುಬತ್ತಿಗಿಡ.
a small, often ornamental, vessel used for holding incense sticks.
= ಊದುದಾನಿ.
a belly swollen from a disease.
= ಊದುಕಡ್ಡಿ.
an ornamental, plant-shaped metal holder used for holding incense sticks.
a protruding or swollen belly; a pot-belly.
a bag-like mammary organ containing two or more glands, each with a separate teat, as in cows; the udder.
a white or yellowish emulsion secreted by the mammary glands of female mammals for suckling their young; milk.
= ಊಧ.
the quality or state of being deficient; absence of something essential; incompleteness; defect or defectiveness; deficiency.
crippledom; disablement in the body; maimedness.
(pros.) a metre or a foot lacking a syllable or syllables.
the state of being defective; the quality of not being complete, full or comprehensive.
the state of being mutilated; maimedness.
= ಊನತೆ.
a man who is limited in outlook or lacking in tolerance or is prejudiced; a narrow-minded man.
injury or harm to a person or thing, resulting in a loss in soundness or value; damage.
a ritual observed for the dead between 27th and 30th days from the day of death.
a ritual observed for the dead between 340th and 355th days form the day of death.
to make short or shorter; to reduce the length, size, effect, influence, etc.; to shorten; to curtail.
(dial.) to blow gently (usu. to cool a hot beverage or to soothe a burn or an ulcer).
the creeper, Basella alba ( = B. Cordifolia) of Basellaceae family.
the creeper, Basella rubra, of the same family, leaves of which are used as vegetable; Indian spinach.
temperature; warmth.
heat; sultriness.
the husk of paddy, wheat or other grain separated in hulling, threshing or winnowing; chaff; hull.
hair or wool that has fallen on its own from the body.
the plant Poa annua of Poaceae family.
to move with some force (said of the wind or a current of air); to blow.
to blow air from the mouth.
= ಊಬುಹುಲ್ಲು.
any bristle-like fibre or fibres, as on the head of wheat, barley, paddy, etc. awn.
the grass, Aristida adsensionis of Poaceae family.
its awn.
the grass Heteropogon contortus ( = Andropogon contortus) of Poaceae family, used for making brooms; spear grass.
= ಊಮೆ.
(referring to a man with regard to the distance from the speaker) a person being at a place in between the ones which can be referred to as 'here' and 'there'.
a man or woman who is lacking the power of speech; a dumb person.
inability of a person to speak; dumbness.
a verbal message.
the plant Andrographis paniculata ( = Justicia paniculata) of Acanthaceae family.
all over the town.
very wide.
= ಊರಗುಸೆ.
sliced vegetable, fruit, etc. that is preserved in a spicy solution, which is used to enhance the tastefulness of the meal.
name of a demi-goddess.
the main entrance of a town.
the waste matter of the town.
a healing; restoration to health or a sound condition.
gain; advantage; benefit.
a help; aid; assistance.
the inner side of the thigh.
any unit of measure approved by the town authorities.
the governing of a town; the local government.
(correctly, ಊರೊಡೆಯ) the chief of a town.
the chief or the most aged man of a town.
the tree Mallotus philippensis ( = Rottlera tinctoria) of Euphorbiaceae family.
a prostitute in temples or religious organisations.
a prostitute in general.
the area or land adjoining a town.
that which is related to the thigh.
the caste and a member of business community.
that which is known to all in the town.
(a town) to be destroyed; to be demolished.
to destroy, demolish a town.
the destruction of a town.
(ironically referring as an elephant) a swine; a pig.
a cow that is domesticated (as opp. to the wild).
love for one's town.
to rule, govern a town.
the chief of a town.
a villager.
the plant Ageratum conyzoides of Asteraceae family.
the chief of a town.
to cause to rule or govern a town.
a sweet, unleavened cake fried in ghee (clarified butter).
a man born in country-side, as distinguished from a city-born.
a man lacking refinement, polish or sophistication; a rustic, simple, uncouth man.
to cause (as an insect, snake, scorpion, etc.) to sting.
to plant - a) to put into soil, to set a plant, to grow; b) to set firmly as into the ground; to fix in a position; c) to fix in the mind; to implant.
to pierce with or as with a knife.
to cause to flow or leak out slowly.
to cause to secrete or fill with saliva.
accepted; admitted.
to establish oneself firmly at; to settle oneself in a place.
to set firmly (as a plant, a pole, etc.) into the ground.
to fix firmly in a position.
to bite; to sting.
to pierce; to stab.
to flow or leak out slowly.
(saliva) to secrete.

a town - a) a group of houses; a village; b) a more or less concentrated group of houses and private buildings, larger than a village but smaller than a city; c) a city or other thickly populated urban place;

ಊರ ಕೋಣ ūra kōṇa a male buffalo let out free to grow on its own in the town in the name of the town-goddess; 2. (fig.) a man living on other's labour, leading a roguish life; ಊರಬಟ್ಟೆ ūra baṭṭe a road to or from a town; ಊರ ಚಿಂತೆ ಕಟ್ಟಿಕೊಂಡು ವೀರಶೆಟ್ಟಿ ಬಡವಾದ ūra cinte kaṭṭikoṇḍu vīraśeṭṭi baḍavāda (prov.) = ಊರ ದನ ಕಾಯ್ದು ದೊಡ್ಡ ಬೋರೇಗೌಡ ಅನ್ನಿಸಿಕೊಂಡ; ಊರಿದ್ದಲ್ಲಿ ಹೊಲಗೇರಿ ūriddalli holagēri (prov.) there are harmful, wicked people everywhere; ಊರಿಗೆ ಅರಸನಾದರೂ ತಾಯಿಗೆ ಮಗ ūrige arasanadrū tāyige maga (prov.) however great a man be, still he is a son for his mother; social or political status cannot spoil thepersonal relation witne's mother. ಊರಿಗೆ ಬಂದವಳು ನೀರಿಗೆ ಬರಲಾರಳೆ? ūrige bandavaḷu nīrige baralāraḷe (prov.) be patient till it happens completely, it will certainly happen in the natural sequence; ನೀರು ಇದ್ದರೆ ಊರು, ನಾರಿ ಇದ್ದರೆ ಮನೆ nīru iddare ūru, nāri iddare mane (prov.) a house without a lady is a nothing but a desert as a town without water; ಊರು ಸೂರೆಯಾದಮೇಲೆ ಕೋಟೆ ಬಾಗಿಲು ಹಾಕಿದರು ūru sūreyāda mēle kōṭe bāgilu hākidaru (prov.) to prescribe preventive medicine after the patient is dead; to try to stop the leak after the entire wine is run out; shut the stable door when the steed is stolen; ಊರ ಮುಂದೆ ನೇಗಿಲು ಹೂಡಿದರೆ ಕಂಡಕಂಡವರಿಂದ ಒಂದೊಂದು ಮಾತು ūramunde nēgilu huḍidare kaṇḍakaṇḍavarida ondondu mātu (prov.) public work always draws lot of criticism; a house build by the way side is either too high or too low; ಊರು ಹೊಲಗೇರಿ ಒಂದು ಮಾಡು ūru holagēri ondumāḍu (prov.) to make a great deal of noise; to raise hell; ಊರು ಹೋಗು ಅನ್ನು, ಕಾಡು ಬಾ ಅನ್ನು ūru hōgu annu, kāḍu bā annu (prov.) to be in the last stage of one's life; to have one foot already in the grave; hence show no interest or pretend not interested, in worldly matters); ಊರು ಓಡುತ್ತೆ ಅಂತ ಕುರುಡ ಓಡಿದರೆ ಕೆಳಗೆ ಬೀಳುತ್ತಾನೆ ūru ōḍutte anta kuruḍa ōḍidare keḷage bīḷuttāne (prov.) do try not run behind others unless you can; your capacity and knowledge must guide you rather than what others do; ಊರ ಗುದ್ದಲಿ ತಂದು ನಾಡ ಕಾಲುವೆ ಅಗೆದ ūra guddali tandu nāḍa kāluve ageda (prov.) he strives hard to get name undertaking public welfare job by using public resources; ಊರಲ್ಲಿ ತಿರಿದುಣ್ಣು, ನನ್ನಲ್ಲಿ ಪದಹಾಡು ūralli tiriduṇṇu, nannalli padahēḷu (prov.) let other take care of you, but let your labour be for me; ಊರು ಸೇರಿದ ಮೇಲೆ ದಾರಿಯ ಹಂಗೇಕೆ? ūru sēridamēle dāriya haŋgēke (prov.) to be an ingrate; kick the ladder once you reach the top; ಊರು ನೋಡಿ ಬಾ ಅಂದರೆ, ತೋರಣ ಕಟ್ಟಿ ಬಂದ ūru nōḍi bāa ndare, tōraṇa kaṭṭi banda (prov.) to do something that is not asked to or required; ಊರು ಮಾಡಿದ ಕೊಳಗ, ತಾಯಿ ಮಾಡಿದ ಹೊಟ್ಟೆ ūru māḍida koḷaga, tāyi māḍida hoṭṭe (prov.) mother is the architect of her children; ಊರ ದನ ಕಾಯ್ದು ದೊಡ್ಡ ಬೋರೇಗೌಡ ಅನ್ನಿಸಿಕೊಂಡ ūra dana kāydu doḍḍa borēgauḍa annisikoṇḍa (prov.) the fool is busy in every man's business but his own; ಊರ ಸುದ್ದಿ ಕಟ್ಟಿಕೊಂಡು ಕೊತ್ವಾಲ ಬಡವಾದ ūra suddi kaṭṭikoṇḍu kotvāla baḍavāda (prov.) = ಊರ ದನ ಕಾಯ್ದು ದೊಡ್ಡ ಬೋರೇಗೌಡ ಅನ್ನಿಸಿಕೊಂಡ; ಊರಿಗೆ ಹಬ್ಬವಾದರೆ ನಾಯಿಗೆ ಲೊಳಲೊಟ್ಟೆ ūrige habbavādare, nayige loḷaloṭṭe (prov.) when the rich have a feast, the poor lick the plate; ಊರಿಗೆ ಉಪಕಾರಿ, ಮನೆಗೆ ಮಾರಿ ūrige upakāri, manege māri (prov.) the hen that cackles in your house and lays in another's; ಹೋಗದ ಊರಿನ ದಾರಿ ಕೇಳು hōgada ūrina dāri kēḷū (prov.) to labour for getting unnecessary thing; ಊರು ಉಪಕಾರ ಅರಿಯದು, ಹೆಣ ಶೃಂಗಾರ ಅರಿಯದು ūru upkāra ariyadu, heṇa śřŋgāra ariyadu (prov.) the public service never brings appreciation and dead body can never recognise the decoration on it; ಊರು ಬೇರೆಯಾದರೂ ಪ್ರಾರಬ್ಧ ಬೇರೆಯೇ? ūru bēreyādarū prārabdha bēreyē (prov.) change of cloth can never change your destiny; ಊರ ಬಾಗಿಲು ಮುಚ್ಚಬಹುದು, ದೂರುವ ಬಾಯಿಯನ್ನು ಮುಚ್ಚಲಾಗದು ūra bāgilu mucca bahudu,dūruva bāyiyannu muccalāgadu (prov.) one can control the newspapers, but cannot control gossiping; ಊರ ಮೇಲೆ ಊರು ಬಿದ್ದರೆ ಶಾನುಭೋಗನಿಗೆ ಕೆಟ್ಟಿದ್ದೇನು? ūra mēle ūru biddare, śanubhōganige keṭṭiddēnu? (prov.) to be unconcerned to any disaster that may befall the outside world, as long as your interests are not affected; ಊರೆಲ್ಲಾ ತಿರಿದು ಜೂಲುನಾಯಿಗೆ ಹಾಕಿದ ūrrellā tiridu jūlunāyige hākida (prov.) be a slave to the entire town to bring up a dog; ಊರೆಲ್ಲಾ ನೆಂಟರು, ಉಣ್ಣಲಿಕ್ಕುವವರಿಲ್ಲ ūrellā neṇṭaru, uṇṇalikkuvavarilla (prov.) be amidst a large number of kith and kin, still lonely and helpless; ಬಾಯಿ ಒಳ್ಳೆಯದದರೆ ಊರು ಒಳ್ಳೆಯದು bāyi oḷḷeyadādare ūru oḷḷeyadu (prov.) people are good to you if you are good to them; ಊರಕ್ಕಿ ಊರಬೇಳೆ ಉಂಡು ಹೋಗೆ ಮಾರವ್ವ ūrakki ūra bēḷe uṇḍu hōge māravva (prov.) I host a feast for you at the cost of the others, but let the credit be mine; ಊರಿನವರಿಗೆಲ್ಲಾ ಒಂದು ದಾರಿಯಾದರೆ, ಎಡವಟ್ಟನಿಗೇ ಒಂದು ದಾರಿ ūrinavarigellā ondu dāriyādare, eḍavaṭṭanigē ondu dāri (prov.) stupidity is the unique way a stupid has; ಊರಿಗೆಲ್ಲಾ ಒಬ್ಬನೇ ಸೆಟ್ಟಿಯಲ್ಲ ūigellā obbanē settiyalla = ಊರಿಗೆಲ್ಲಾ ಒಬ್ಬಳೇ ಪದ್ಮಾವತಿಯಲ್ಲ; ಊರಿಗೆಲ್ಲಾ ಒಬ್ಬಳೇ ಪದ್ಮಾವತಿಯಲ್ಲ ūrigellā obbaḷē padmāvatiyalla (fig.) to not be the only person who is important in a situation or in a group; ಊರಿಗೆಲ್ಲಾ ಸಾರು ūrigellā sāru (fig.) to tell everyone about something.
that part of the leg in humans between the knee and the hip; the thigh.
a town or a village that is endowed to someone to provide an income, for the service.
a public platform in a town, where people meet.
one of the two varieties of crow (genus: Corvus, family: Corvidae) with glossy black plumage, found in villages, towns and cities, (the other being ಕಾಡುಕಾಗೆ, the raven).
(pl.) in gen. the roads of a town.
the place where a person or a thing is; whereabouts.
= ಊರುಗೋಲು.
a man of or living in the countryside, as distinguished that of in the cities.
a man who is rough, awkward, boorish, lacking refinement or sophistication.
ಊರುಗರ ನುಡಿ ūrugara nuḍi the speech that is offensive to others' feelings or to prevailing notions, of modesty or decency; obscene or vulgar language; ಊರುಗರ ಮಾತು ūrugara mātu = ಊರುಗರ ನುಡಿ.
a thick staff, pole used as a support; a prop.
= ಊರೆ.
the most valorous man of the town.
sliced vegetable, fruit, etc. that is preserved in spicy solution, which is used to enhance the tastefulness of the meal.
the management, responsibility of managing a town or village.
any animal that walks on the whole sole, as a human or bear; a plantigrade.
a common variety of sparrows that is found in human habitats (as distinguished from the variety that lives in the wild).
to destroy a village; to spoil the normal life of a town.
= ಊರೆ.
= ಊರೆ.
a stick carried while walking, for support, as by old people.
a staff to support a lame or infirm person in standing or walking, with a crosspiece at the top to fit under the armpit or a curved rest to take the weight on the forearm; a crutch.
(fig.) anything to lean on for support; a person or thing that supports.
a member of the business community ( the originator of which community is believed to have been born from the thigh of Viṣṇu.
the business or profession of a trader.
= ಊರುಗೋಲು.
so high or tall as to reach to the knees from the bottom of foot; knee-high.
the presiding goddess of a town.
the chief of a village or town.
= ಊರುದಘ್ನ.
= ಊರುದೊರೆ.
(fig.) a man skilful in deception; a man of sly, crafty character.
the knee - a) the joint between the thigh and the lower part of the human leg; b) the front part of the leg at this point.
a prostitute in temples or religious organisations; a prostitute in general.
the main entrance of a town.

poisoning caused by the toxin produced by botulinus bacteria, usually found in improperly canned or preserved foods, which mayt result often in muscular paralysis and disturbances of vision and breathing; botulism.
the root that helps the plant stand firm and erect; a prop root.
a common agony or distress being suffered by all or most of the persons in a village or town.
he who serves all in a town.
the opinion or pleasure of all or most of the people of a town.
the pair of thighs in humans.
= ಊರುಯುಗ.
a pig reared in a town (as distinguished from the wild one).
a dog (regarded, sometimes sarcastically, as the lion of the town).
to soak.
to keep in a liquid preservative or vinegar (as pickles).
the creeper Momordica charantia of Cucurbitaceae family.
its gourd; bitter-gourd.
a public meal.
(erotics) clasping the partner with the thighs.
a structure of wood, stone or brick built against a wall to strengthen or support it; a buttress; a prop; an abutment.
the temporary framework used to support an arch, dome, etc., while under construction; centring.
to support (a roof or bridge etc.) with a truss or trusses; to truss.
= ಊರೆಗೊಡು.
to give a solid support to uphold or to prevent from falling; to prop; to abut.
ಊರುಗೋಲು.
to uphold with the help of a prop.
a domesticated she-buffalo.
a machine used to lift or hold up something heavy (as a vehicle, etc.) to a small height; a jack.
the cultivated gingili plant oil, Sesamum indicum (family: Pedaliaceae).
its oil-yielding seed; sesame.
to move from one place to another; esp., to leave one's town and settle in another; to relocate (oneself).
(pl.) the families of a town.
that which belongs or is related to all the people in a town.
a street in which the important people (as the chief, accountant, money lender, etc.) of a town live.
the office, responsibility of the chief of a town.
= ಊರುದೊರೆ.
a village-guard; a town-watchman.
he who destroys the village or spoils the normal life of a town.
the hairdresser, barber of a town.
the fort of a town.
the most valorous man of the town.
the office, responsibility of the chief of a town.
to rule, administrate the affairs of, a town.
= ಊರ್ಕಾವಲಿಗ.
a watchman of the harvested crop or threshed grains.
= ಊರ್ಗಾಮುಂಡು.
= ಊರ್ಗಾಮುಂಡುಗೆಯ್.
ability to do; capacity of doing; power.
exertion or striving; a vigorous attempt; effort.
the eighth month of the Hindu calendar.
a man having ability, capacity or power.
an able, powerful, mighty or strong man.
(rhet.) a figure of speech, speaking of anything with contempt.
ability to do; capacity of doing; power.
able; powerful; mighty; strong.
advanced; progressed; prospered.
